title: Marketplace Tech for Friday, May 30, 2014
teaser: On today's show, Jonathan Zittrain, Professor of Law at Harvard and co-founder of the Berkman Center for Internet and Society, talks about the hacker Sabu and his deal with the federal government that got him out of prison. Plus, we're joined by Adriene Hill to talk about the launch of LeanringCurve and retro tech in the classroom. And how well have you kept up with the week in tech? It's time for Silicon Tally! This week, Ben takes on NASA engineer Bobak Ferdowsi, A.K.A. Mohawk Man.
description: On today's show, Jonathan Zittrain, Professor of Law at Harvard and co-founder of the Berkman Center for Internet and Society, talks about the hacker Sabu and his deal with the federal government that got him out of prison. Plus, we're joined by Adriene Hill to talk about the launch of LeanringCurve and retro tech in the classroom. And how well have you kept up with the week in tech? It's time for Silicon Tally! This week, Ben takes on NASA engineer Bobak Ferdowsi, A.K.A. Mohawk Man.
